answers.answer: Nothing in life is a guarantee. Children often times pickup parents bad habits and MAY carry them into adulthood. This is one bad. The other bad, that cannot be prevented, is you inherited your parents diabetes gene. Doesn't matter if you are Mr Universe, if you got the gene your risk of getting diabetes is higher than the next person. Go see a doctor and get an "Genetic test for diabetes" and an A1c to see your blood glucose levels over the past 3 months.Continue your healthy lifestyle. That in itself is the best prevention and blood glucose control.
